Storm Reach.name: Storm Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 2 yards.
Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 4 yards.

Convection.name: Convection
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 5%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 10%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 15%.

Concussion.name: Concussion
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 1%. Also increases the effectiveness of your Chain Heal spell by 1%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 2%. Also increases the effectiveness of your Chain Heal spell by 2%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 3%. Also increases the effectiveness of your Chain Heal spell by 3%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 4%. Also increases the effectiveness of your Chain Heal spell by 4%.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 5%. Also increases the effectiveness of your Chain Heal spell by 5%.

Earth's Grasp.name: Earth's Grasp
descriptions: Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by 50%, the duration of your Earth Shock, Earthbind and Stoneclaw Totems by 25% and reduces the Mana cost of your Earthbind and Stoneclaw Totems by 25%.
Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by 100%, the duration of your Earth Shock, Earthbind and Stoneclaw Totems by 50% and reduces the Mana cost of your Earthbind and Stoneclaw Totems by 50%.

Elemental Warding.name: Elemental Warding
descriptions: Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 5%.
Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 10%.
Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 15%.

Call of Flame.name: Call of Flame
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 10% and increases critical strike chance of your Flame Shock by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 20% and increases critical strike chance of your Flame Shock by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 30% and increases critical strike chance of your Flame Shock by 30%.

Reverberation.name: Reverberation
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 1 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 5 sec.

Sand Blast.name: Sand Blast
descriptions: Sends a wave of sand, blinding nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Targets must be facing you. Any damage caused will remove the effect.

Elemental Focus.name: Elemental Focus
descriptions: Gives you a 2% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 4% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 6% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 8% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Gives you a 10% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell.  The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

Call of Thunder.name: Call of Thunder
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by an additional 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by an additional 4%.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
descriptions: Gives you a 25% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning.
Gives you a 50% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning.
Gives you a 75% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning.

Elemental Fury.name: Elemental Fury
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 40%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 60%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 80%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 100%.

Elemental Devastation.name: Elemental Devastation
descriptions: Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with all attacks and spells by 5% for 5 seconds.
Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with all attacks and spells by 5% for 10 seconds.
Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with all attacks and spells by 5% for 15 seconds.

Improved Fire Totems.name: Improved Fire Totems
descriptions: Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 1 sec. and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by 50%.
Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 2 sec. and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by 100%.

Elemental Mastery.name: Elemental Mastery
descriptions: When activated, this spell gives your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell a 100% critical strike chance.

Lightning Mastery.name: Lightning Mastery
descriptions: Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 0.6 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 0.8 sec.
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells by 1 sec.

Elemental Precision.name: Elemental Precision
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 5%.
Increases your chance to hit with Fire, Frost and Nature spells by 10%.

Lightning Overlord.name: Lightning Overlord
descriptions: Your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells criticals will refund 10% of their base mana cost.
Your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells criticals will refund 20% of their base mana cost.
Your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells criticals will refund 30% of their base mana cost.
Your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells criticals will refund 40% of their base mana cost.
Your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Chain Heal spells criticals will refund 50% of their base mana cost.

Static Field.name: Static Field
descriptions: Gives your damage spells a 20% chance to energize you, increasing damage and reducing Mana cost of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 1% for 20 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.
Gives your damage spells a 40% chance to energize you, increasing damage and reducing Mana cost of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 1% for 20 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.
Gives your damage spells a 60% chance to energize you, increasing damage and reducing Mana cost of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 1% for 20 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.
Gives your damage spells a 80% chance to energize you, increasing damage and reducing Mana cost of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 1% for 20 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.
Gives your damage spells a 100% chance to energize you, increasing damage and reducing Mana cost of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 1% for 20 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.

Earthquake.name: Earthquake
descriptions:
Shakes the ground, shocking enemies for trivial amount of Nature damage. Each hit causes an echoes that inflicts damage to nearby enemies.
The effect lessens with distance to the epicenter. 
Also dazes the targets for 5 seconds and causes a high amount of threat.
